This game as many others is full of cheaters.
I have 20 years experience in gaming and I can detect with wisdom when a player has a wallhack or aimlock.
I know it is impossible to code a good protection. 
But to eradicate cheaters, editor should have to be concerned by his product and his future. Not really the case...
If you want to take pleasure on this game, play with your friends on a local server.
